A Timeless title, will revisit again and again.

One really good and well made game also a classic too! It is significantly longer than Portal, with more challenging puzzles and a ton of new puzzle mechanics, also the story is really good. If you are thinking on buying this game I recommend playing Portal first to understand the story. Overall this is a masterpiece of a game!

A novel idea, perfectly executed. 
Awesome characters, masterfully voice acted.
Oozing with atmosphere: mystery and humor.
Amazing replay value and co-op.

Only two negatives I can think of and neither of them count:
1. Sometimes I wish I could sprint. But that would be less time in a beautiful game and would probably break some puzzles.
2. The campaign ends and it makes me sad.
THIS GAME IS THE BEST GAME IN HISTORY

A one of a kind (well um... two of a kind i guess) game. fantastic, funny, puzzle and platformer. old friends and new enemies, and Chell is hot. Fantastic voice acting too. you cant go wrong. if you havent played this by now, buy and beat portal 1, then buy and beat portal 2. its a blast. great co-op mode too. THE ONLY BAD THING about this game is that the puzzles start to get a little old and stale towards the end of the game. but seriously play this game you'll thank yourself. seriously. go.
